title: Out Of Darkness Comes The Shadow
description: Out of darkness comes the shadowâ€¦In this chilling novel an ancient cult comes out of the shadows to threaten the democracy of the free world.Porsha Fairchild, an agent of the SBI, Sentinel Bureau of Investigations, is plagued by a troubled past. Each day is a fight for her sanity. A fight for tomorrow.While out on a punishing run, in New York City, a loud explosion grabs her attention. The ground vibrates beneath her feet. Plumes of black smoke rises from a nearby subway station. The source of the explosion is obvious. The cause, the what, the who, and the why are yet to be answered.
author: SD Logan
